post:
SolarVM offers high quality VPS servers in The Netherlands.
We only use the best hardware and networks, and have a rich featureset.

Click here to visit our site!

All our VPS include

1 Gbps Connection in NL (Tier 1)
High Bandwidth per VPS (can be increased)
SolusVM Control panel
OpenVZ Virtualization
Instant Setup
TUN/TAP Ready
PPP Ready
Control Panels Available

Our Plans:

Mini VPS

256MB Dedicated RAM
1 vCore (Xeon CPU)
10GB Disk
250GB Bandwidth
1Gbps Port
NL & US Available

Basic VPS

512MB Dedicated RAM
1 vCore (Xeon CPU)
20GB Disk
500GB Bandwidth
1Gbps Port
Monthly Payment: $7.00 / month

If you have any questions please contact us at our LiveChat or support@solarvm.com
